remarks: A morphism of rings is a function.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) $.
ringcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringchomfvalOLD.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
ringchomOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringchomOLD.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
elringchomOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X H Y ) -> F : ( Base ` X ) --> ( Base ` Y ) ) ) $.
